Author: animalslover4569

Comment: Trump said more than once that tax hikes for the affluent can't be done because the GOP is "traditionally" the party against tax hikes. That's an excuse? Tradition is the reason for having to cut the federal budget to the bone and closing down agencies that help the most vulnerable among us? Fuck your tradition!     He also said billionaires will leave the country if they have to pay more taxes. Let them leave then. What do they offer this country? Really, what is the great benefit for America to have blood-sucking grotesquely wealthy people living here? If they start businesses, they do it in foreign countries where the wages are lower. If they have domestic businesses, they outsource their workers whenever possible for the same reason.     There is absolutely no valid reason not to make the richest of the rich pay their fair share of this country's taxes. Absolutely none. How much money do people need? How many lives are worth losing so they can keep every cent they own? I believe there is such a thing as having too much money. I adamantly support a wealth cap as a way of closing the unequal wealth gap. A country as rich as ours should not have working people living in poverty. Each and every job should pay a living wage. If the GOP wants women to stay home having bushels of babies, then for god's sake pay them and contribute to their Social Security. Ask yourself, Republicans, what would your Jesus do?
